name: Klearat Pellets
description: Reliable and highly palatable formulation containing brodifacoum creating outstanding acceptance and effective control of Rats with a single feed. Klerat® Pellets are suited to use in both urban and rural situations, including food industry, domestic, public and commercial premises. Klerat® Pellets are best laid in bait boxes in dry conditions. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
